00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
00024 
00025 #include <cstring>
00026 
00027 #include <boost/thread/xtime.hpp>
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00033   class Timer {
00034   public:
00035 
00036     Timer(uint32_t millis, bool start_timer=false)
00037       : m_running(false), m_remaining(millis) {
00038       if (start_timer)
00039         start();
00040     }
00041 
00042     void start() {
00043       if (!m_running) {
00044         boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00045         m_running = true;
00046       }
00047     }
00048 
00049     void stop() {
00050       boost::xtime stop_time;
00051       boost::xtime_get(&stop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00052       if (start_time.sec == stop_time.sec)
00053         m_remaining -= (stop_time.nsec - start_time.nsec) / 1000000;
00054       else {
00055         m_remaining -= (stop_time.sec - start_time.sec) * 1000;
00056         m_remaining -= ((1000000000 - start_time.nsec)
00057                         + stop_time.nsec) / 1000000;
00058       }
00059       m_running = false;
00060     }
00061 
00062     uint32_t remaining() {
00063       if (m_running) { stop(); start(); }
00064       return (m_remaining < 0) ? 0 : m_remaining;
00065     }
00066 
00067     bool expired() { return remaining() == 0; }
00068 
00069     bool is_running() { return m_running; }
00070 
00071   private:
00072     bool m_running;
00073     boost::xtime start_time;
00074     uint32_t m_remaining;
00075   };
00076 
00077 }
00078 
00079 #endif // HYPERTABLE_TIMER_H
